item.title: Documentation Of Django Encrypt File
item.description: This is no longer maintained. Use it at your own risk. Django Encrypt File is a simple Library which can be used to encrypt uploaded files and store them.|||||||||| Installation Use pip to install it: pip install djangoencryptfile Or pip install https://github.com/ruddra/django-encrypt-file/tarball/0.7 Basic usage from djangoencryptfile import EncryptionService from django.
